overview: Based on a best selling novel.It revolves around Khadija. When the real criminal Abdul Hakim (Zaki Rostom) escapes, Khadija (Amina Rizk) is falsely accused of murdering the owner of a factory. This forces Khadija to leave her daughter with her cousin and she is raised by Sheikh Jalil to become a fine lawyer.
title: The Bread Seller
